content.text: Generally cabling installed in urban areas does not need protection from lightning. Protection is generally  needed if cables containing metallic parts are installed in rural areas.
For more detailed information refer to EN 61663-1 for optical fibre cable and to EN 61663-2 for copper cable  as well as EN 62305 series.

c) use of surge protective devices.
The use of combined protective measures is also possible to reduce the likelihood of damage due to  lightning.
